refnamediv.refpurpose: Replicates one audio data sream to multiple channels.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Writes a single audio value to all avalavble audio channels

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Sends audio samples to all accumulating output buffers (created at the beginning of performance) which serves to collect the output of all active instruments before the sound is written to disk. There can be any number of channels sprecified in nchns which al eceive the same data.
